name: The Magistrate
description: The Magistrate is an internet marketing agency in Vancouver with global reach and SEO solutions to match any need. The expert digital marketers at The Magistrate can help you with local SEO, PPC, online reputation management and web design. Our experience in online marketing allows us the flexibility to create custom solutions for our clients. No matter what business you’re in, or what need you’re responding to, we can help you do it even better.
